data.name: CreateMonthlyObligeeSummary
ReadCsePerson
data.value: select top(1) NUMB from CKT_CSE_PERSON where NUMB = @numb

data.name: ReadMonthlyObligeeSummary
data.value: select top(1) YER, MNTH, PT_RECAP_AMT, DISBURSEMENTS_SUPP, RECAPTURED_AMT, NA_ARS_RECAP_AMT, PASSTHRU_AMOUNT, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, ADC_REIMBURSED_AMT, CPA_S_TYPE, CSP_S_NUMBER, COLLECTION_AMT, COLLCTN_DSB_TO_AR, FEE_AMT, TOT_EXCESS_URA_AMT, NBR_OF_COLLECTIONS, NA_CURR_RECAP_AMT from CKT_MNTHLY_OBE_SUM where (YER = @yer) and (MNTH = @mnth) and (@cpaSType = CPA_S_TYPE) and (@cspSNumber = CSP_S_NUMBER)

data.name: UpdateMonthlyObligeeSummary
data.value: update CKT_MNTHLY_OBE_SUM set PT_RECAP_AMT = @ptRecapAmt, DISBURSEMENTS_SUPP = @disbursementsSupp, RECAPTURED_AMT = @recapturedAmt, NA_ARS_RECAP_AMT = @naArsRecapAmt, PASSTHRU_AMOUNT = @passthruAmount, LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy, LAST_UPDATED_TMST = @lastUpdatedTmst, ADC_REIMBURSED_AMT = @adcReimbursedAmt, COLLECTION_AMT = @collectionAmt, COLLCTN_DSB_TO_AR = @collctnDsbToAr, FEE_AMT = @feeAmt, TOT_EXCESS_URA_AMT = @totExcessUraAmt, NBR_OF_COLLECTIONS = @nbrOfCollections, NA_CURR_RECAP_AMT = @naCurrRecapAmt where (YER = @yer) and (MNTH = @mnth) and (CPA_S_TYPE = @cpaSType) and (CSP_S_NUMBER = @cspSNumber)
